sentences.sContent: Conforming and imitation are part of the self, as are competition and the ruthlessness of talent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conforming and imitation are part of the self, as are competition and the ruthlessness of talent.
sentences.sCn: 顺应和模仿是自我的一部分，竞争和才能带来的冷酷无情也是。

remMethod.val: 来自ruthless(adj. 残忍的， 无情的)

trans.tranCn: 无情， 冷酷， 残忍
